TableSettings.uniqueName: IdeConnections%23OFPI-P3-TNSselect o.*, s.nls_length_semantics, s.plsql_ccflags, s.plsql_code_type, s.plsql_debug, s.plsql_optimize_level, s.plsql_warnings , s.plscope_settings from DBA_objects o, DBA_plsql_object_settings s where o.owner = :OBJECT_OWNER and o.object_name = :OBJECT_NAME AND ROWNUM = 1 and object_type = :OBJECT_TYPE and s.owner = :OBJECT_OWNER and s.type = :OBJECT_TYPE and s.name = :OBJECT_NAME
